text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC NOPE. All on you Spanky. He asked you to wear masks and social distance to keep you from killing us, HIS PEOPLE,  and you refused. You wanted to kill us all with Covid-19 and he stood up to you. THANK YOU GOVERNOR COOPER FOR SAVING US FROM THE ORANGE MONSTER.
